website_summaries.verdict: This supplement contains the high levels of protein and fat that kittens receive from their mother’s milk, alongside a range of additional nutrients for an all-around healthy milk replacement.
pros: Powdered formula contains real milk proteins, minerals, antioxidants, taurine, and omega fatty acids
Similar to a mother cat’s natural milk
cons: Powdered supplement must be mixed for your kitten

website_summaries.verdict: This is a fine powder that mixes easily, leaving few clumps behind. Suitable for babies and adults, but isn't quite as gentle on sensitive stomachs as competitors.
pros: Blends easily, so it flows through a kitten bottle nipple without clogging it
Contains nutrients that are necessary for kittens, yet it can also be used as a supplement for adult cats
cons: May cause digestive upset/vomiting in some kittens or adult cats

customer_reviews.title: Great! For cats who are old and sickley to rebuild health
customer_reviews.text: I fed it to my old cat who I thought was on his last leg. He wasn't eating well, and was throwing up his food hard or soft after every meal. I realized if he was a person we would give him ensure shakes to try to help. IT worked, I fed it to him for a bout a week, and he kept it down, and now he is back to being annoying, and eating regular foods.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Bugs
customer_reviews.text: There are worms and beetles in this replacement milk that just arrived. My kittens are 2 weeks old I planned for their mom to be fixed and ordered this to feed them while she was away. How am I suppose to feed these newborns this!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Kitten milk is the bomb
customer_reviews.text: The kittens were left alone early and the vet gave me special food which they were not fond of. THIS, THIS they loved. How do you save kittens from dying of dehydration? Mix up Kitten milk. How do you Get kittens to eat? Mix up kitten milk and mix into food. How do you get kittens to easily take medications? Mix into kitten milk first thing in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly helpful
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely helpful to me. My poor female cat had a really large litter of kittens and giving her some of this for added nutrients was exactly what she needed to help her care for her kittens.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good size for the price and my kitty loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a kitty i was nurturing since she was still drinking her mom's milk when she got taken away , she loved this milk i fed her for about 3 weeks and i did not even finish the bottle had so much .
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Orphan kitten is doing well on milk replacer!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for shipping it so fast! I was worried I would not get it right away, but Amazon customer service person made it possible. My orphan kitten has been steadily gaining weight. She has been drinking the milk replacer with no problems. Her tummy has improved and now she had been having no issues and is getting healthier and heavier. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: SAVED MY NEWBORN ORPHANED KITTEN'S LIFE!!!
customer_reviews.text: THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!! My husband brought home a baby kitten from work. It's mother was ran over by a forklift & he found the baby so he brought it to me & baby formula was sufficing, but I've read that newborn kittens need A LOT MORE FAT & PROTEIN than ANY baby formula has to offer so this product had exactly what my little baby needed!!! LIFESAVER!!! GREAT PRICE!! THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was using kmr formula used this a few time and the kitten got diarrhea and gas it was horrible switch to Walmart brand no problems and cheap
customer_reviews.author: Sarah hayes

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick
customer_reviews.text: I offered this to my cat two times. Both times she was violently ill, and spent the the rest of the day vomiting. The first time, I thought it was a coincidence. After the second indecent, I put this in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Hiro Protagonist

customer_reviews.title: For my experience...
customer_reviews.text: At first my kitten took to it a little but after a day he started to vomit. Then I noticed when cleaning his bottle there was a slippery greasy feel to the inside that the formula leaves. Baby did not like this formula after the second time.
customer_reviews.author: Cha Lia

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loves it.
customer_reviews.text: After the stray kitten got a little older I switched from a prepared liquid milk to a powdered milk. Easy to make, and the kitten really drinks it up. Good value for the money too.
customer_reviews.author: david hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens
customer_reviews.text: Idk why it asks about flavor, obviously I hope nobody is eating this. It's great for the newborn kitten we found abandoned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kitten milk
customer_reviews.text: Kittens love the milk and good ingredients in there for them also. Have always used this brand whenever I have to give kittens milk.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Miller

customer_reviews.title: For healthy kittens
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love it and adult cats love it as well
customer_reviews.author: DeianeiraRenae

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My momma cat loves this! And the baby kitties do too! .. it doesn’t give them gas or diarrhea like the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Greer

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving container
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Too much money for such a large container with barely anything in it.
customer_reviews.author: bettyjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for mom & babies.
customer_reviews.text: Momma cat loves it. Ordered another for babies as they wean.
customer_reviews.author: Nadina Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Our Kitten Is Begging for more.
customer_reviews.text: Was able to nurse a kitten back to health by adding a pound of weight using this product for two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gorelik

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love this milk replacement
customer_reviews.text: Kittens love to drink this milk replacement since we adopted them
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Lacandola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect transaction!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product to bottle feed many kittens and they all flourish on it.
customer_reviews.author: cameo1382

customer_reviews.title: Our Ferrets get 1Tbsp once a week and they goo ...
customer_reviews.text: Our Ferrets get 1Tbsp once a week and they goo...nuts over it!!!
customer_reviews.author: JCofABQ

customer_reviews.title: useful for weaning...
customer_reviews.text: it helped the kittens get used to wet food. I mixed it with canned kitten food and they gradually got used to real food.
customer_reviews.author: cyd conner

customer_reviews.title: It was the replacement was sent and it came on time. Product is great
customer_reviews.text: First it was set to arrive late and then it said it arrived but it didn't. Just got the replacement today and I'm very happy and I'm happy with the product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rachel V.

customer_reviews.title: Kittens liked it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a donation to sick premature kittens they were very happy
customer_reviews.author: Katy Olsen

customer_reviews.title: The kittens love it
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 abandoned 5 week old kittens and they absolutely loved this. So easy for me to make for them too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri McNulty

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Just rescued a 5 week old kitten & needed to get him fed ASAP. He loves this stuff!! I feed it to him in a bowl as a bottle doesn’t seem necessary. Really happy with product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Yamilca A.

customer_reviews.title: They loved it and grew well using it
customer_reviews.text: worked well for the 5 tiny kittens I am raising by hand! They loved it and grew well using it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good milk replacer for kittens
customer_reviews.text: I had 4 stray kittens that were left by their mother. I bought this to use. It is very easy to mix with hot water and feed to them. They were eating this very often but they were not pooping very often even with me trying to assist them. They all passed away even with me trying to feed them this milk.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality milk replacement
customer_reviews.text: This milk replacement is absolutely amazing! My little kitten loves it! No digestive issues while using this formula! Initially I tried GNC ultra mega milk formula for kittens. My 8week old kitten got severe diarrhea from it! And once I started reading other reviews- I realized I’m not the only one who experienced this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Yuliya Shrum

customer_reviews.title: Great kitten milk!
customer_reviews.text: A better choice for one of the rescue kittens I had to bottle feed. He was throwing up and having diarrhea with the brand available at my local pet store. This formula mixes easily in a blender bottle. Also great to be able to mix just the amount needed for a day or two at a time so no waste. Much more economical than the premixed canned formula.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Glancy

customer_reviews.title: Kittens digged it
customer_reviews.text: My kittens loves it. Used it during the weaning process from mom. Gave it to mom too for extra calories during lactation
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Kittens go crazy
customer_reviews.text: I've owned cats all of my life and I've never had to purchase kitten formula before now. This formula was a life-saver and the powdered formula is extremely economical. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tai M

customer_reviews.title: The next best thing to mothers milk
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 3week old kitten and it was so nice she loved
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loved this milk, he gobbled it right up!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Mama Cat Hit Her Kittens Away From It. Try Catsip.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the amount
customer_reviews.text: Used this for our two tiny kittens we saved they were less than a pound each and now they weigh over two pounds each doing super good. Still have some left over as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moller

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this junk. Even starving feral kittens wouldn't take it
customer_reviews.text: It was very thin. Tried to feed 4 kittens with it over several days. None of them would take it at all. Made it in various ratios with water. They wouldn't touch it. Switched to warmed cream and they couldn't get enough.
customer_reviews.author: John A Lahore

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever
customer_reviews.text: Had to stop using after 2 feedings. One kitten died and the rest are having intestinal issues now. Don't buy don't use.
customer_reviews.author: samantha m.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is poison, nearly killed my daughters kitten!!! it made her weak and lethargic and the scent of this stuff smells like strawberry milk..im pretty sure that is not how a mother cats milk smells. This stuff made her constipated and miserable. We switched her to KMR formula which saved her life! she is doing so much better and is very active and playful and purrs non stop and is running all over the place! STAY FAR AWAY FROM THIS HARTS BRAND ANYTHING! even their nurser bottle is junk, i wrote a review about that thing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: We have kittens that needed this. I tried this and KMR. Even though KMR is claimed to be the better choice, it gave my kittens diarrhea, and they didn’t like it. But, the Hartz didn’t cause diarrhea, and my babies love it. Very happy with it. Helps my kitties gain weight
customer_reviews.author: Julia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Competitive price compared to similar products
customer_reviews.text: More reasonably priced than competitive brands. Kittens like it fine. I pre-mixed some and it spoiled so I wish the directions had said something about that. Otherwise would order again
customer_reviews.author: SheraBx

customer_reviews.title: Received as a gift...
customer_reviews.text: ... and no longer have a kitten, so donated it to a local shelter. They were happy to get it, and said that Hartz is a brand they often use.
customer_reviews.author: PJ in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: Took a while for the kitten to accept. Very hot water needed to dissolve without being gritty.
customer_reviews.author: McIntyre Family

product_meta.title: Hartz Powdered Kitten Milk Replacer Formula - 11Oz
product_meta.description: Regular cow’s milk is not a sufficient source of nutrition for a kitten. Hartz Powdered Kitten Milk Replacer is precisely formulated to emulate mother’s milk with the optimal balance of vitamins, minerals, and essential nutrients to support growth and development during the formative first 6 weeks of life. Suitable as a supplement for pregnant, nursing, or convalescing cats and ready for on-demand feeding - just mix with room temperature water. Use with our newborn pet bottle – specifically sized for small mouths (sold separately).
feature_bullets: Precisely Formulated To Match A Mother Cat’S Milk
Quick-Mix Powder Blends Easily With Room Temperature Water For On-Demand Feeding; Use With The Hartz Nursing Bottle (Sold Separately)
Features Calcium For Strong Bones, Taurine For Heart And Eye Development, Lysine For Respiratory Health And Linoleic Acid To Support Healthy Skin And Coat
Can Also Be Used As A Food Supplement For Pregnant And Nursing Mothers, As Well As Convalescing Cats
Regular Cow’S Milk Is Not A Sufficient Source Of Nutrition For A Kitten
The Optimal Balance Of Vitamins, Minerals, And Essential Nutrients To Support Growth And Development During The Formative First 6 Weeks Of Life.
